agrar.io.view

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • agrar.io.view.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GameView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Displays the game environment and circles
    Author:
    Matthias, Flo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • calculateZoom

        private void calculateZoom(Player localPlayer)
        Calculate the amount of zoom necessary to fit the local player in the view. The View is always zoomed that the player is 15% of the length of the shorter side of the view.
        Parameters:
        localPlayer - the local Player
